summary: As a lead software engineer at KPMG, I have engaged in variety of projects advancing breadth and depth of my knowledge on technologies
highlights: I developed a backend, daily porting framework, to serve telecom daily porting data to some of the biggest mobile carriers. I used Flask, Postgresql, Redis, gunicorn and nginx for this project. This project brought, over 1 million in revenue for the company.

I deployed daily porting framework in AWS infrstructure, I used, Cloudfront, autoscaling, ELB and SAML based authentication. This deployment helped us to make a fault tolerant and highly available application.
I designed and implemented a report generation, Excel and PPT, engine using .Net, Used C# and SqlServer. I helped to move employees to more productive work by automating report generation.

summary: As a research associate, I implemented parallel algothims for graph theory algorithms.
highlights: I implemented parallel algorithm to solve maximum independent set problem in a graph, using tree decomposition

summary: As Sr. Software Engineer, I contributed to Apache Axis2/C project while in WSO2
highlights: I worked as a core developer and release manager for Apache Axis2/C project
I implemnted several transport layers for Axis2/C, including XMPP and TCP transports
